title: Trick Shot Competition - Phil Mickelson vs Grant Horvat
concept: Overconfident Phil Mickelson challenges nervous Grant Horvat to a trick shot competition

scenes.description: Challenge setup and initial trash talk

dialogue.line: I could do this with my eyes closed
dialogue.action: Adjusts golf cap confidently, takes practice swing

dialogue.line: Alright, let's give this a shot
dialogue.action: Fidgets with golf club, looks uncertain

dialogue.line: I'm about to show you how a real golfer plays this game!

dialogue.action: Steps up overly confident, doesn't even line up properly

dialogue.line: And Phil Mickelson completely whiffs it...
Fairways don't bother me...not when you have the right driver in your hand. ...wait, did I actually do it?
dialogue.action: Modest celebration, can't believe they won

dialogue.line: Lesson learned: Confidence doesn't always equal performance!

costume.clothing: Golf apparel, often with branding. Wears distinctive glasses.
costume.accessories: Performance glasses (often the subject of jokes)

key_traits.celebration_style: subdued when losing, boastful when winning

production_notes: Film in 4K for crisp golf action shots
Use multiple camera angles for challenge attempts
Include slow-motion replays of key moments
Add upbeat background music during setup
Use dramatic music for challenge attempts
Include text overlays for score tracking
